meanings.definition: Combine or blend into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The two rivers merge to form a larger stream.
meanings.sent2: During the road construction, two lanes merge into one.
meanings.sent3: The colors of the paint merge together like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the city lights merge into a glowing skyline.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the spices merge perfectly in the soup.
